event.title: ADempiere Japan Users Group / the 20th seminar
event.catch: 日本ADempiere ユーザー会 / 第20回勉強会
event.description:
Time Table

  1. Opening (はじめに)

  2. Intro Part (導入編)

    • Introduction of ADempiere (ADempiereのご紹介)
  3. Recent Movements (最近の動き)

    • Up-to-date information of ADempiere/iDempiere (ADempiere/iDempiere最新動向)
  4. ADempiere-related Topic (ADempiere関連トピック)

    • Introduction of ADempiere Inplimentation for Service businesses (サービス業への適用事例からみるADempiere導入の初歩)
  5. Business/System Part (業務/システム編)

    • Introduction of Business Operation for Payroll (給与計算業務入門)
    • ADempiere3.4 ERP Solutions

      • Chap.7 Accounting Information and configuration (会計情報と設定)
      • Chap.8 Managing Inventory (在庫管理)
  6. Wrap Up (まとめ)

    • future plan (今後の予定)
    • Q/A
  7. Networking (懇親会)
    http://atnd.org/events/34327

Materials (unfinished)

Sample Scenario

Registration Fee (参加料)

free (無料)
